name: Duplication Escape
description:
This game was made for Zenojam 4 and was completed in under 72 hours based on the theme "I am everywhere"

It is recommended, though not required, that players play the levels in numeric order, saving the optional challenge level for last.

Please feel free to list any aspects of the game that are confusing or any bugs found in the comments. Criticism is appreciated and encouraged.

Controls:

A/D - move left/right

W/enter - jump

space - duplicate (create new clone)

left/right arrow keys - swap clone

esc/P - pause/unpause

Credits:

Lab Level Textures used in tile map credited to mutantleg https://opengameart.org/users/mutantleg

Font credited to JLH Fonts http://www.publicdomainfiles.com/show_file.php?id=13486265331446
